name: Undertones
description:
Undertones is a casual puzzle game in VR based on the subject of "TeamBuilding".   

It's a Fantasy Asymetrical game with one player wearing the VR headset, one player on the computer and one or more on books and paper documents.

This executable is a demo of Undertones containing the two first levels.
The demo require documents that are not avalaible at this time. 
So see this executable as a technical demo more than a full experience.Press F2 to load the 2nd Level and F1 to load the 1st Level.
